name: Attuned_Opportunity_Strikes_B
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Sentinels and may be slotted into any Sentinel damage power.
